body.bibl: Kelley, Nicole. “On Recycling Texts and Traditions: The Pseudo-Clementine Recognitions and Religious Life in Fourth-Century Syria.” In The Levant: Crossroads of Late Antiquity. History, Religion and Archaeology / Le Levant: Carrefour de l’Antiquité Tardive. Histoire, Religion et Archéologie, edited by Ellen Bradshaw Aitken and John M. Fossey, 105–12. McGill University Monographs in Classical Archaeology and History 22. Leiden: Brill, 2014.
